      返回带有指定名称的该类型的枚举常量。
      static EdgeDirection[] EdgeDirection.values()
      按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序, 返回 包含这些常量的数组。

    • org.apache.flink.graph.gsa中EdgeDirection的使用

      返回EdgeDirection的org.apache.flink.graph.gsa中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      EdgeDirection GSAConfiguration.getDirection()
      Gets the direction from which the neighbors are to be selected By default the neighbors who are target of the edges are selected
      参数类型为EdgeDirection的org.apache.flink.graph.gsa中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void GSAConfiguration.setDirection(EdgeDirection direction)
      Sets the direction in which neighbors are to be selected By default the neighbors who are target of the edges are selected

    • org.apache.flink.graph.spargel中EdgeDirection的使用

      返回EdgeDirection的org.apache.flink.graph.spargel中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      EdgeDirection ScatterGatherConfiguration.getDirection()
      Gets the direction in which messages are sent in the ScatterFunction.
      EdgeDirection ScatterFunction.getDirection()
      Retrieves the edge direction in which messages are propagated in the scatter-gather iteration.
      参数类型为EdgeDirection的org.apache.flink.graph.spargel中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ScatterGatherConfiguration.setDirection(EdgeDirection direction)
      Sets the direction in which messages are sent in the ScatterFunction.
